header: Advanced Computing Facility (ACF) Power Outage: Thursday 28th August 1200 BST - Monday 15th September 1800 BST
text: Due to a significant Health and Safety risk, associated with our power supply to the site, that requires action at the ACF, there will be a full power outage to the site. Specialised external contractors will be working on a 24/7 basis for the outage period replacing switchgear. The EIDF Services are hosted at the ACF. All EIDF Services will be completely powered off for the duration of this period. Updates will be provided during the outage at https://docs.eidf.ac.uk/status/.
